title: Executioner
desc:
Post 60
*Hey, who shuffled a Mafia role card into the deck?*
This card is not publicly announced when drawn. When you play it, you start an elimination phase. All of the players must vote for someone during the elimination phase, and the player with the most votes dies (causing them to lose $2000 for hospital bills)
A random player will be given to you as a target. If they are killed in the elimination phase, you gain $500. If that death causes the target to go bankrupt, you gain $2000 instead.
